LanguageData.Stove_Core.label: 熔炉核心
LanguageData.Stove_Core.description: 一个用于储存岩浆的熔炉核心，请将其置于密封环境。

LanguageData.Stove_Core_Frame.description: A Stove Core That you can use to storge lava
LanguageData.Inputer.label: 进料器
LanguageData.Inputer.description: 一个用于给熔炉进料的进料器，但需要放一个进料器料斗。
LanguageData.Inputer_Blueprint.label: Inputer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Inputer_Frame.label: Inputer (building)
LanguageData.Inputer_Frame.description: A Inputer That It can Input stuffs in to stove core.And it need a Stuff Inputer Hopper

LanguageData.Inputer_Hopper_Frame.label: Stuff Inputer Hopper (building)
LanguageData.Inputer_Hopper_Frame.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.

LanguageData.Outputer_Frame.label: Outputer (building)
LanguageData.Outputer_Frame.description: A Inputer That It can Input stuffs in to stove core.
